author: Home RenoVision DIY
description:
I’ll show you how to pour a concrete pad for your AC unit step-by-step, so you can get it right the first time. From prepping the base to finishing a perfectly level concrete slab for your air conditioner, I’ll walk you through the tricks I use to keep it from sinking and protect your HVAC system for years. Whether you’re replacing an old pad or installing a brand new air conditioner base, this method will get the job done right. Want it done right? Do it yourself! 

If you found this video helpful, please subscribe. Hope you enjoy. Cheers! Watch all of the videos from the new project 👉🏼https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL34cQkzKfXWbw0cvItwuNkLOpdJF7gu18

Welcome to the Forever Home Series! That's right, i bought a new project house and I'm tearing it apart. I’m bringing this 1974 home back to the studs and completely reconfiguring the space so it makes sense for my wife’s forever home. I’ve missed renovating this way. This series will be a comprehensive guide for homeowners and D
title: How to Pour a Concrete Pad That Will NEVER FAIL
